name: Defeating your Monsters
description:
For better experience play in Full Screen Mode.

Summary:

Your home is not always a good place to be. It's up to you to stand up for yourself. Play through the challenges and help the protagonist to make his home a safe place.

Game made for Global Game Jam 2019.

Credits:

Gabriel Ribeiro - Sound and Progamming

Thiago Berardinelli - Programming

Thiago Nunes - Art
